name: sshwifty
description: Sshwifty is a self-hosted SSH and Telnet client running in the browser, allowing secure terminal sessions through a web interface without a traditional client installed.
features: Browser SSH: Connects to SSH servers directly from web browser.
Telnet support: Accesses Telnet servers alongside SSH connections.
Multiple sessions: Opens multiple SSH connections in tabs simultaneously.
Terminal emulation: Provides full terminal emulation with color and formatting support.
File transfer: Uploads and downloads files via SFTP in browser.
Authentication: Supports password, public key, and keyboard-interactive auth.
Session persistence: Maintains connections across browser refreshes.
Responsive design: Works on desktop and mobile browsers.
Clipboard integration: Copies and pastes text between browser and terminal.
Configurable: Customizes appearance, fonts, and connection settings.
No plugins: Works without browser plugins or extensions.
Secure connections: Encrypts all traffic between browser and server.
